choiceList.name: HTML Elements
choiceList.description: Explore the world of HTML elements and tags. Learn how to structure your web content and create stunning websites using the power of HTML.

choiceList.name: Animals
choiceList.description: Discover the fascinating realm of animals. From cute pets to wild creatures, delve into the diversity of the animal kingdom and learn interesting facts about our furry and feathered friends.

choiceList.name: System calls
choiceList.description: In computing, a system call (commonly abbreviated to syscall) is the programmatic way in which a computer program requests a service from the operating system on which it is executed.
